    function UnwrappedLink<T extends ElementType = ElementType>(
      props: Omit<ComponentPropsWithRef<ElementType extends T ? "a" : T>, "as">,
    ) {
      return <a></a>;
    }

      props: Omit<ComponentPropsWithRef<ElementType extends T ? "a" : T>, "as"> & {
        as?: T;
      },
    ) {
      return <a></a>;
